segments.text: Did you get a chance to speak with the sellers about my counter-offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and I think I have good news for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , they accepted your counter-offer , but they want you to pay for the home inspection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will cost you around five hundred to one thousand dollars for a home inspection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I choose the home inspector ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you are paying for it , so you get to choose . I would pick the best one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , when are you going to inform the owners of my acceptance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will call the owners right now . They will be happy to hear the good news .
segments.speaker: S2
